A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Any true Star Wars fan cannot get through 5 minutes of this movie without thinking to themselves \"why did they do this??\". From start to finish it is a complete mess with no depth and it's only saving-grace comes from talented acting of Mark and other returning characters despite a garbage script. Overall\, this is easily the worst Star Wars movie ever and completely ruins the plot-lines the first movie had developed; even worse it robs you of the excitement for the next movie.
